#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
int t;
long long int n,k,x,y;
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
	    scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&k);
	    if(n<=k)
	    {
	        printf("%d\n",k-1);
	    }
	    else if(n>(k*(k+1))/2)
	    printf("-1\n");
	    else
	    {
	       y=sqrt(1+ 8*(((k*(k+1))/2)-n));
	       x= ((-1)+y)/2;
	       printf("%lld\n",x);
	    }
	}
	return 0;
}
